summary: Denver is the capital and largest city in Colorado, with over 700,000 people. It's known as the "Mile High City" because it's exactly one mile above sea level. Founded during the Gold Rush in 1858, it has grown into a major cultural and economic hub. Denver is home to many museums, sports teams, and the Denver Performing Arts Complex. The city is also famous for its beautiful location near the Rocky Mountains and its sunny weather. It was even named the best place to live in the U.S. in 2016.
title: Denver
